price: គេ(ហ៊ូទ)មិនមែនជាអ្វីក្រៅពីជាបុរសដែលបានប្រឌិត រឿងភូតកុហកទៅលើអល់ឡោះនោះឡើយ។ ហើយពួកយើងក៏ មិនមានជំនឿនឹងគេដែរ។
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban wamā naḥnu lahu bimu'minīna
